title: ‘Goat Bones in the Basement’ lecture explores ‘dark tourism’ (KU - The University of Kansas) ...
text: ( Source : KU - The University of Kansas ) LAWRENCE - A chance visit to a haunted house tour in Savannah, Georgia , led to a new area of research for a scholar who will present the lecture ' Goat Bones in the Basement : A Case of Race , Gender and
